alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Deer Valley; East Valley; Gila Bend; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 24 at 1:03PM MST until January 25 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures in the lower 30s expected. * WHERE...Gila Bend, Buckeye/Avondale, Deer Valley, Scottsdale/Paradise Valley, The East Valley of the Phoenix Metro Area, South Mountain/Ahwatukee and Southeast Valley/Queen Creek. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Deer Valley; East Valley; Gila Bend; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek
